content.question: What is the independent variable in this study?

choices.label: The use or nonuse of the CPAP device by participants
The percentage of total sleep time that participants spent in REM sleep
The severity of sleep apnea symptoms for each participant
The number of participants in each group

content.answer: The use or nonuse of the CPAP device by participants

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
